# NSAppClipRequestEphemeralUserNotification

**Property List Key**

A Boolean value that indicates whether an App Clip can schedule or receive notifications for a limited amount of time.

## Discussion

Set the corresponding value to `true` to enable your App Clip to schedule or receive notifications for up to 8 hours after each launch. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppClip/enabling-notifications-in-app-clips].
title: NSAppClipRequestEphemeralUserNotification
